definitions: a key on a typewriter or computer keyboard that causes the carriage or cursor to move backward.
shortDefinitions: key on typewriter or computer keyboard used to cause carriage or cursor

definitions: a device on a video recorder or camcorder which produces a slight backward run between shots to eliminate disturbance caused by the interruption of the scanning process

examples.text: begin with a few seconds of static shot, remembering to allow for backspace time

shortDefinitions: device on video recorder or camcorder which produces slight backward run between shots to eliminate disturbance caused by interruption of scanning process

definitions: move a typewriter carriage or computer cursor back one or more spaces.
shortDefinitions: move typewriter carriage or computer cursor backwards
